member.name: IStorageProviderHandler.GetPropertyHandlerFromFileId
member.summary: Gets an instance of associated with the provided file identifier.
member.param: The identifier for the relevant file.
An instance associated with the file specified by fileId.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IStorageProviderHandler.GetPropertyHandlerFromPath
member.summary: Gets an instance of associated with the provided path.
member.param: The path for the relevant file.
An instance associated with the file specified by path.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IStorageProviderHandler.GetPropertyHandlerFromUri
member.summary: Gets an instance of associated with the provided URI.
member.param: The URI for the relevant file.
An instance associated with the file specified by uri.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
